idea-plugin.name: XHttp
idea-plugin.description:
English
  • Run tests based on SpringBoot and SpringMvc developed interfaces.
  • Integration port closed, quickly generate Markdown file small function.
  • Post requests are not supported using the split JSON object receive method.
  • If you have any Suggestions or bugs during continuous optimization, please email to 819536266@qq.com.
  • thank you.
  • view on https://gitee.com/BeALaity/Xhttp
中文
  • 运行基于SpringBoot和SpringMvc开发的接口的测试.
  • 集成端口关闭，快速生成Markdown文件小功能.
  • 暂不支持Post请求使用非JSON对象接收方法的测试.
  • 在持续优化过程中,如有任何建议或bug，请发邮件至819536266@qq.com,谢谢.
  • Git地址 https://gitee.com/BeALaity/Xhttp
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.1.1
  • Based on the interface of SpringBoot and SpringMvc, it supports one-key generation of corresponding interface testing tools
  • Modify the window adaptation problem, improve the interface parameter cache

  • 基于SpringBoot和SpringMvc的接口，支持一键生成相应的接口测试工具
  • 修改窗口适配问题，请求接口参数缓存

1.1.2
  • Plugin.xml adds JAVA dependencies
  • Add support for RequestMapping
  • Add automatic exclusion parameter,HttpSession,HttpServletResponse,HttpServletRequest

  • xml添加了JAVA依赖关系
  • 添加对RequestMapping的支持
  • 添加自动排除参数，HttpSession,HttpServletResponse,HttpServletRequest

1.2.0
  • The return information is automatically JSON formatted
  • Supports file upload requests
  • RequestBody requests are supported
  • Request headers are dynamically added and removed
  • When you click Clear, clear the single request cache
  • Sets the add exclude parameter configuration
  • The request parameters box can be dragged

  • 返回Body自动JSON格式化
  • 支持文件上传请求
  • 支持RequestBody请求
  • 请求头可以动态添加和删除,重启客户端清除
  • 当您单击清除时，清除单个请求缓存
  • 设置添加排除参数配置
  • 可以拖动“请求参数”框

1.2.1
  • Add port close widget

  • 添加端口关闭小部件

1.2.2
  • Fix some bugs
  • Fix global configuration, restart client automatic reset problem
  • Add return TAB.ResponseBody automatic JSON formatting bar,Response bar,URL bar,Header bar
  • There are three types of sending requests: address bar, form, and Body
  • Continuous optimization

  • 修复一些BUG
  • 修复全局配置，重启客户端自动重置的问题
  • 添加返回选项卡。自动JSON格式化栏，响应栏，URL栏，标题栏
  • 发送请求有三种类型:地址栏、表单和正文
